div.head: EVROPA.
div.p: The countries of Europe, as we now call them are Spaine, France, Germanine, Italie, Slauonia, Grzce, Hungarie, Polonia, Lituauia, Morcouise!!!, or more fignifcatly the countrie of Sarmatia , and the Peninr!!!la in which is Norway,Swethem,and Gothland.Among the lies, Albion,conteyning England & Scotland is the chiefelt!!!, next vnto in haue ue Ireland, then more northerly is Ifland!!, Frifland!!, & Iaftly!! Groonland,all in the Ocean fea!, In the Mediteraneum fea it hath Sicilia, Sardina, Corfica, Candie, Maiorica, Minorica, Corphum, Nigropont , and others of leffe!! fame , whofe!! f!eural name, and fituations doappeere in the Mappe.

This our Europe (befides!! for the Romaine Empier) honorable throughout all the world hath aboue 28 Chriftain!! Kingdoms,yf you adde the 14 which fome!! recon only in Spain . It is paffling fertil , naturall temperate ,and of a milde aier . And inferior to no other parte in plentie of all kinde of fruit, wyyne ,and pants,but to be compared with the moft exellent ,beeing made pleafant!!
